name: Country Farms Organic Apple Cider Vinegar Tonic, Cleanses and Detoxifies, Helps Balance Fluids, Supports Digestion, With The “Mother”, Ginger Cayenne & Maple, 16 Fl. Oz.
short_description: PROMOTES HEALTHY WEIGHT MANAGEMENT. Apple cider vinegar has been praised for its value for centuries. This health tonic has been linked to healthy weight control and proper fluid balance.

ADDED GINGER, CAYENNE & MAPLE. The addition of ginger helps to boost immunity and enhance the cleansing. Cayenne is a pepper that is shown to increase calorie burning metabolism. Finally, maple provides antioxidant protection.

PURE APPLE CIDER VINEGAR FOR WATER BALANCE & DIGESTIVE HEALTH. Each tablespoon of Country Farms Apple Cider Vinegar provides your body with 15 grams of apple cider vinegar plus ginger, cayenne and maple. This potent combination may help promote proper water balance.
WHAT’S INSIDE EACH BOTTLE. Each bottle of Country Farms Apple Cider Vinegar contains 32 servings of pure USDA Organic apple cider vinegar with ginger, cayenne and maple.

ABOUT COUNTRY FARMS. At Country Farms, we aim to provide health-minded individuals with nutrient-dense super greens supplements to help boost their daily nutritional levels. Our mission is to create premium, farm-fresh, and efficacious formulas designed to support well-being and vitality that are also affordable to cost-conscious consumers.
product_description: Country Farms Organic Apple Cider Vinegar, when supplemented daily, helps maintain a wide range of health functions; This includes balancing pH levels, promoting natural skin health, maintaining healthy digestion, supporting your immune system, weight loss and more. Apple Cider Vinegar has been valued for centuries and, despite its bitter flavor and slightly pungent odor, so many still seek it out for its benefits, including its active "mother" Ingredient. Plus, the ginger, Cayenne, and maple all work together to boost immunity, enhance cleansing, increase calorie-burning, and minimize cell damage. This includes 32 servings. Since 1972, Country Farms has served as a trusted source of wholesome, nutrient-dense supplements for health-minded individuals. Their mission has always been to create premium, clean formulas designed to provide balance for Central nutrition, health and vitality while supporting overall well-being with convenient, easy-to-use supplements. They strive to inspire quality, natural health choices, which shows in their products that burst with benefits like vitamins, minerals, protein, antioxidants, omegas, fiber, and digestive enzymes. These supplements offer health-conscious convenience without sacrifice and are prepared with integrity to restore your daily nutritional levels. This is the pure, fresh-from-the-garden promise of nature's finest from Country Farms.

name: Wedderspoon Apple Cider Vinegar With Monofloral Manuka Honey & The Mother, 25 fl oz
short_description: APPLE CIDER VINEGAR: Our Apple Cider Vinegar is crafted in New Zealand from cold-pressed apples and naturally fermented. Enjoy one 25 Fl Oz BPA free bottle of our signature Apple Cider Vinegar with Manuka Honey.
AUTHENTIC FLAVOR: We add Manuka and Beechwood Honeys for a slightly sweet, slightly tart taste. This gives our cider such a great unique flavor you won't want to go back to regular ciders.
MULTIPLE USES: Use this in your daily tonics, energizing elixir, salad dressings, or just use it to a zesty kick of flavor to any dish.
NATURALLY MADE: Crafted in New Zealand without heat or chemicals. Unpasteurized, unfiltered, and raw.

RAW HONEY: If you enjoy apple cider vinegar from Brag, Kevala, Trader Joe's, Dynamic, Raw Seed, Vermont Village, & Spectrum – Try Wedderspoon’s variety of amazing apple cider products and you will never go back!
product_description: Wedderspoon Apple Cider Vinegar with Multifloral Manuka Honey is crafted from cold-pressed apples and naturally fermented to preserve the Mother of Vinegar. We then add raw Manuka Honey (a New Zealand superfood), raw Beechwood Honey (a prebiotic) plus antioxidant-packed New Zealand Blackcurrant for added wellness benefits and taste.

name: Lucy's Family Owned - USDA Organic NonGMO Raw Apple Cider Vinegar, Unfiltered, Unpasteurized, With the Mother, 34oz GLASS Bottle
short_description: WHY WATER? – Lucy’s Organic Apple Cider Vinegar is diluted with water to make it milder and more palatable for consumption. It also increases its cohesiveness in recipes, drinks, and as a health tonic.

ABSOLUTELY NO APEEL - Hundreds of our customers have reached out asking if our family's brand uses Apeel. We'll get right to it! - Lucy's Organic Apple Cider Vinegar uses absolutely NO apples that have been coated or covered in Apeel. Blessings to you all!

LUCY'S ORGANIC COMPOSITION - Lucy’s Organic Apple Cider Vinegar is USDA Organic certified, Non-GMO Project Verified, Certified Organic by Organic Certifiers, and contains the very best elements there is to a top shelf premium quality Organic Apple Cider Vinegar. Our batch includes the “mother” and comes raw, unfiltered, unpasteurized, and contains absolutely no preservatives! Organically grown apples that produce a perfect golden color and rich thick taste is why everyone loves Lucy's Apple Cider Vinegar.

APPLES! - Almost all of Lucy's Organic Apple Cider Vinegar is made from apples in the PACIFIC NORTHWEST REGION. Believe it or not but Washington State actually grows more apples than any other U.S. State! Due to its abundance of water, nutrient-saturated soil, and teeming climate, this flourishing piece of land has been recognized for producing some of the country’s best apples for generations.

THE STRENGTH AND BEAUTY OF GLASS- Lucy's Organic Apple Cider Vinegar is packed in 34oz. glass bottles which is the superior choice for packaging juices compared to plastic due to its numerous advantages. Glass is inert and non-reactive, ensuring that no harmful micro-plastics or foreign material is leached into the juice, preserving its purity and taste. It's also impermeable, preventing oxygen from entering and maintaining the juice's freshness, nutritional value, and vibrant color.

100% FAMILY OWNED, FOUNDED AND OPERATED - Lucy’s was established in 2003 by Miguel and his wife. They both share 4 wonderful kids who have all worked for the family business since then! Miguel’s family immigrated from Mexico to California and began creating products for the Hispanic market in Los Angeles. Since then, Lucy’s has seen national expansion and began developing state of the art health and wellness products for consumer’s in the United States.

name: Mother Earth, Organic Apple Cider Vinegar with The Mother, Fresh Pressed Organic Apples, OACV, ACV, Raw, Unpasteurized, Unfiltered (1/14oz Apothecary Glass Bottle with Pour Spout)
short_description: CERTIFIED ORGANIC - Kosher certified (OU), Non-GMO Project Verified, unpasteurized, unfiltered, raw, preservative-free, naturally gluten-free. Fermented premium blend of pressed, organic apples.
WITH “THE MOTHER” - All vinegars start with “The Mother”, but most producers (not us!) filter, distill, or pasteurize to remove the beneficial microorganisms (and probiotics!) that are “The Mother”.
LONG FERMENTATION MEANS SMOOTH TASTE - In a 100 yr old process, our ACV is aged for three months in redwood barrels, allowing sufficient time for the vinegar to mature and develop complex flavors.
PREMIUM QUALITY - In every bottle of Mother Earth Vinegar, you’ll find the same delicious honey-golden apple cider vinegar, with a taste that’s smoother and more rounded out than other vinegars.
LOVED BY VINEGAR PURISTS AND FOODIES - Grace your table with this easy pour 14 oz bottle. Remove rubberized stopper to refill. Premium organic apples. Traditionally crafted. Processed to 5% acidity.

product_description: Apple Cider Vinegar, Raw & Unfiltered is a great tasting, Certified Organic mix of Raw, Unfiltered, Unpasteurized Bragg Apple Cider Vinegar and Purified Water, diluted to 5% acidity. Use 2 tablespoons in water to make a delicious organic drink, adding a little organic honey, maple syrup, blackstrap molasses or 4 drops of stevia, or try it as a topping or addition to cereals, salads, vegetables, even popcorn. You can also use as a marinade or in stir-frys and in other recipes. Enjoy the natural goodness and taste of this Organic Apple cider vinegar. It's an ideal pick-me-up for home, work, sports, or gym. Try drinking some upon rising, in the mid-afternoon or any time you need a quick energy boost. Each bottle contains 128 ounces of pure vinegar. You'll find many uses for this unique product.

name: Eden Organic Apple Cider Vinegar, Raw, Unpasteurized with Mother, 16oz Glass
short_description: Organic, naturally fermented with 'mother' of vinegar.
product_description: Eden Organic Apple Cider Vinegar is naturally fermented with 'mother' of vinegar, a friendly natural bacteria culture similar to 'starter' used to make country bread. Appearing as cloudiness in the final product, the presence of mother indicates the best quality raw vinegar. The apple juice goes through a primary fermentation to reach the desired alcohol content, and a secondary fermentation to change the alcohol into acetic acid. Then it is patiently aged. Eden Vinegar is bottled in amber glass to protect its flavor, bouquet and nutritional integrity. Apple Cider Vinegar is traditionally the most widely relied upon vinegar in North America. Its soothing, healthy, and rejuvenating effects are very well documented from diaries of the early pioneers to the Internet. Applied externally cider vinegar was used to soothe sunburns, bee stings, insect bites, athlete's foot, dandruff and acne; to soften dry skin, strengthen nails and restore luster and shine to dull hair. It is also used liberally to massage sore muscles. Vinegar has provided good health and zest to people for over 7,000 years. Most commercial vinegars are highly denatured through the use of extreme heat and chemical solvents. They are formulated rather than fermented. Please avoid any vinegar labeled 'distilled', as it is the most highly refined and least healthful. For the flavor and benefit of true raw vinegar choose Eden. Eden Organic Apple Cider Vinegar is an excellent ingredient for dressings and sauces. To make an old time Yankee tonic combine two teaspoons Eden Organic Apple Cider Vinegar and one teaspoon of good honey in a cup of water. A safe effective way to clean fruits and vegetables: soak them in water with a splash of Eden Organic Apple Cider Vinegar. Mix with Edensoy as an egg replacement in Apple Sauce Muffins in the recipe section of this site.
